name: Bottle Art
description:
Modern. Trendy. Traditional. FUN! This is Bottle Art — a sand art bottle designer hyper-casual game to keep you entertained for hours.

Don’t you miss those kinetic sand games you used to play? Us too. But they were far too messy, right? Mmm-hmm. Welcome to Bottle Art. This is a new way to fulfill your sand art needs with none of the mess. Yasss!

Awesome for relaxing, challenging yourself, and having fun too!

Here’s how to play:

1. Open the game and grab your bottle
2. Now it’s time to make your sand art picture
3. Fill the bottle using various sand colors
4. But, be careful to follow the design
5. Wow! What a masterpiece! You rock!

Bottle Art is packed with fun designs and features to keep you entertained for ages! So what do you say? Are you up to the creative challenge? Try out Bottle Art and make kinetic sand creations now!
